description:
Our Guarantee: You will fall in love with AcroYoga within your first 45 minutes of taking this course, or your money back.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have you ever been amazed by the seemingly inhuman strength and flexibility of yoga instructors?

You have probably NOT had the chance to see something quite as impressive as AcroYoga, one of the most intense and stunningly beautiful forms of yoga. And, as anyone who has tried it will tell you, it’s also the most fun!

As an AcroYoga practitioner you will find yourself:

  • Investing in your well being like a yogi – the intensity of the practice develops zen-like concentration
  • Communicating and connecting like an acrobat – increase athleticism and experience total control over every muscle of your body
  • You’ll care and comfort like a massage therapist – AcroYoga is like getting a massage WHILE you exercise
  • All while playing like a circus monkey – Who knew yoga could involve playing like you did when you were a kid?

This beginner’s course is the perfect way to learn how to do AcroYoga starting from scratch. You need no prior experience with yoga, and within 45 minutes you will be amazed at what you can do!

Through This 45 Minute Course You Will:

  • Get stronger and more flexible
  • Improve core strength
  • Improve your coordination and balance
  • Experience the intimacy of dual practice
  • Immediately experience intensely positive emotions and stress reduction

Our guarantee to you is that even if you are totally new to yoga, you will fall in love with AcroYoga within the first 45 minutes! So enroll now, you are only 45 minutes away from a better body and a healthier mind!
title: Learn Acro Yoga From Scratch in 45 Minutes!
